backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented UI features to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of key frontend files such as screens, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and dark-mode theme variables defining color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls screen state and switches between question and success screens.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveFixedPositi: Hook that computes random fixed positions for the evasive No button while ensuring visibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and identity management via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Romantic-themed Tailwind styles with gradients, button designs, and heart animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing providers and rendering the App component.
frontend/src/screens/QuestionScreen.tsx: Renders the question UI and implements evasive behavior for the No button with event handlers.
frontend/src/screens/SuccessScreen.tsx: React component showing a success message with floating heart animations using randomized positions and delays.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, fonts, and utilities with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project's state, requirements, and features for a romantic web app with evasive button behavior and a success screen.
